resources.string: The prediction option you choose is :
The password is incorrect, please retype it
Import mnemonic immediately to reset password
Attention! Before you delete the wallet, please make sure that you have backed up the mnemonic words, or you’ll lose the assets in the wallet
I have read and agree to
the terms of service and privacy
Please remember the password of the wallet, Bibi does not store the password, and can not help you find i
Disclosure of mnemonic words will lead to loss of assets. Please write them down carefully and place them in a safe place. Do not take a screenshot
Please write down your wallet mnemonic words and save them to a safe place

Wallet mnemonic words are used to restore wallet assets. With mnemonic words, you can fully control your wallet assets. Be sure to keep them safe. If you lose your mnemonic words, you will lose your assets. Bibi does not store user\'s mnemonic words and does not provide a retrieval function
Back up mnemonic words right now!

In order to protect the security of the assets, please export [mnemonic words] and write them down with a paper to a safe place, do not save them to the computer or internet. It is recommended to restore them immediately after the backup is completed to ensure security. Then try to transfer in and out assets in small amount to start using
Please click on the mnemonic words you wrote down in order to verify that your backup mnemonic words are correct
The order of the mnemonic words you backed up is correct, Bibi will remove the mnemonic words
Enter mnemonic words, separated by spaces
The odds is the actual odds of participation in the prediction, the bonus is based on this odds
The odds is based on the proportion of the current participation in the prediction, the bonus odds is the odds when the prediction ends
BIBI Create a Better Financial World with Blockchain Technology
How are the tokens in the account obtained?
1.The exchanges or wallets that support ERC-20 SEER

Exchange your ERC-20 SEER to main net (Bibi) wallet, the system automatically generates an ETH address for your account. Transfer your SEER to this address from exchanges or ETH wallet, the account on SEER main net (Bibi) will automatically receive SEER at the same amount.

Transfer the Bitshares asset: GDEX.SEER to seer.gateway ( ID#1.2.974186), write "seer#your SEER account"(double quotes not included) in the memo, then it will be exchanged successfully. Try a small amount when exchanging for the 1st time.?
Please contact the officially certified 3rd exchanger, only support transferring in the Dapp.
The odds are the odds of the final award.
Only one user is allowed to register in five minutes
no less than 6 digits and lowercase characters
Username consists of numbers and characters that aren\'t less than 6 digits
Selling num shares of SEER will cost amount SEER
Selling num shares of SEER will cost amount USDT
Selling num shares of SEER will cost amount PFC
Buying num shares of SEER will cost amount SEER
Buying num shares of SEER will cost amount USDT
Buying num shares of SEER will cost amount PFC
Selling amount is larger than buying amount
The current password should not be the same as the new password
User name must first be alphabetic
Transfer amount must be greater than 0
1.The exchanges or wallets that support ERC-20 USTD
1.The exchanges or wallets that support ERC-20 PFC

Exchange your PFC from the exchange or wallet to the main network wallet automatically.Omni-pfc USES the BTC network and the system has automatically assigned a BTC address to your account.Transfer the PFC from the exchange or wallet to this address, and the Seer main network (bitcoin) account will automatically get the same amount of PFC.For the first time, it is recommended to try small amount transfer first.
The exchanges or wallets that support Omni-USDT SEER

Exchange your PFC from the exchange or wallet to the main network wallet automatically.Omni-pfc PFC the BTC network and the system has automatically assigned a BTC address to your account.Transfer the PFC from the exchange or wallet to this address, and the Seer main network (bitcoin) account will automatically get the same amount of USDT.For the first time, it is recommended to try small amount transfer first.
The change of handling fee is based on the order handling fee.
